snippet: Regulators and mutual fund executives differ on the stability of money market funds since the financial crisis. The S.E.C. is expected to soon propose more changes in the industry.
abstract: Regulators and mutual fund executives differ on the stability of money market funds since the financial crisis; Securities and Exchange Commission is expected to soon propose more changes in the industry that would affect the kind of money funds available to individual and institutional investors; a fight is expected on what specific changes are eventually adopted.
lead_paragraph: Regulators and mutual fund executives differ on the stability of money market funds since the financial crisis. The S.E.C. is expected to soon propose more changes in the industry.

headline.seo: Money Market Funds May Soon Face More Changes
headline.main: Money Funds Could Face More Changes
headline.print_headline: Money Funds Could Face More Changes
